column4: I was afraid of that.  I am in the US and I have a business contact that is in Austaralia.  He has asked me to get skype as he has a hearing problem and it is actually easier for him to sit at his computer with headphones on and talk to me that way.  Anyone care to go to private conversation and help me get the damned thing installed. I am an ubuntu neophite.  I have been using it less than a week.  I have found the only
you have to to a little bit more work sometimes.  I don't mind that. I love how fast my machine is working now.
Emacs is cool. It does have a steep learning curve though.  Back in the day it made C programming easy though.
well I got skype installed now I need to try it with someone to see if I have the sound and microphone set up.
just call Skype Test Call: echo123
